name: The Evil D
summary: Square up against THE EVIL d, the letter with the most VILE attitude you have ever seen! He’ll throw everything he has left at you in hopes of maintaining his title of the most dastardly letter alive. Will you succumb to his wrath and let him control the fate of the world as he pleases, or will you fight for all that is good? Regardless of the outcome, you best prepare yourself for the ruthlessness of THE EVIL d!
